p: Subjects were randomly allocated to either the challenge (n = 52) or control group (n = 35) on day -1. On day 0, individuals in the challenge group were inoculated intranasally with 5.5 log 10 TCID50/ml/nostril of influenza strain A/H3N2/Wisconsin/67/2005. The control group members were not subjected to challenge ( Figure 1).
